channel.title: Showing off Webiste Allowed (+ question) ;D
channel.description:
Seeming that this section is for "showing off" I assumed that you can show off your website am I correct that will be related to Runescape client hacking?
That is my question, and I know, no questions allowed, so I will also post a Help thing.
"Is it possible that you can store the class8.java on a FTP folder and upload it so the client won't need a file like that, just reads off the site?"

item.title: Showing off Webiste Allowed (+ question) ;D
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

Yup, I made my from scratch, but the forums are Smfforfree4, but you know, we have a domain going and over 2000 posts.

This isn’t some noobifried website, I’ll post.

Read full topic

item.title: Showing off Webiste Allowed (+ question) ;D
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

No your not allowed. If you want to show ur website off goto mitb and post in the web dev section. But read the rules. The website basically has to be made completely by u. They don’t want u showing off smf, or joomla, or some shit like that (and no sites made from a dled template).

Read full topic
